title: guestCの著者ページ
content:
[[include :scp-jp:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dustjacket]]

[[module css]]
.hovertip {
    background-color: #8fbc8f!important;
}

.link-red a{
    color:#B40404;
}

.modal-body td img[src*="userkarma.php"] {
    filter: hue-rotate(150deg);
}

.blur {-webkit-filter: blur(3px);
filter: blur(3px);
}

.text-change div.sitemember:nth-child(2) {
display:none;
}

#page-title {
  display: none;
}
.meta-title {
  border-bottom: solid 1px #bbbbbb;
  color: #000000;
  font-weight: normal;
  margin: 0 0 0.6em;
  padding: 0 0 0.25em;
  font-size: 200%;
}

[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[div_ class="fancyborder"]]
[[div class="text-change"]]
[[module ListUsers users="."]]
[[div class="sitemember"]]
ようこそ、%%name%%さん！
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[div class="sitemember"]]
ようこそ、まだ名前のないゲストさん！
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[module listpages name="guestc" category="author"]]
蔵書点検が%%updated_at|%Y/%m/%d| %%に行われたようです。
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="link-red"]]
[[=]]
**翻訳記事(EN=>JP)**

[[module ListPages created_by="guestC" category="*" name="wandsmen-hub"]]

[[/module]]
